title: which champs buy protobelt?
body: Who buys this item in their core besides {{champion:8}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:105}} ?

replies.body:
Lissandra gets it as her first item according to OP.GG
http://na.op.gg/champion/lissandra/statistics/mid

{{champion:28}}  if she wanted too
{{champion:427}} if he wants some damage...yes this is still a champion
{{champion:68}} for more damage, help with brust and movement speed is nice
{{champion:157}} because the man needs a new belt
hint: ivern almost never wants damage
